Dress Me
Visual equipment change The .dressme command is a brand new system that gives you the chance to change your armors, weapons or cloaks texture to look like a different grade
Warning
Full body armors can use ONLY full body armor textures, and half & half tunic/gaiter armor sets can use textures from other armors with same type half & half tunic/gaiters!
After you purchase the dressme, these features are saved to your character and restored when you log back in.
